component.name: Heroic Games Launcher
component.summary: A Native GUI Epic Games Launcher for Linux, Windows and Mac.

description.p: Heroic is a native GUI alternative to the Epic Games Launcher for Linux, Windows and MacOS. It is open source under GPLv3 and is maintained by a community of developers that works for FREE on their FREE TIME. Heroic for now is just a GUI for Legendary, which is a CLI tool that deals with the login, download and launch the games. Support for other stores is planned in the future.
